page.title: 19St.GUTHLAC
page.content: Guthlac was born in the year 673 A.D. He was a son of a noble family related to the royal house of Mercia. He grew up to be a wild young man, leading a band of his friends in a life of fighting.When he was 24 he suddenly repented of his life and vowed that he would become God's servant.He became a monk.He entered the double monastary-nunnery in Derbyshire at Repton,under Abess Aelfthrytha and he studied for two years.He longed for solitude and a more austere life.So in 699 he asked permission to leave with two followers.He came to a large area of fens that at that time separated Mercia from East Anglia. Guthlac lived like a hermit there until he died at 41 years of age,in 714.
